factoid: Anna Mikháylovna addressed Prince Vasíli saying, "After such a solemn sacrament, allow him a moment's peace."
Anna Mikháylovna told Pierre to tell everyone his opinion.
Anna Mikháylovna turned to Pierre.
Pierre had come quite close to the scene.
Pierre was gazing with astonishment at the angry face of the princess.
The angry face of the princess had lost all dignity.
Pierre was also gazing at the twitching cheeks of Prince Vasíli.
Prince Vasíli said, "Remember that you will answer for the consequences."
Prince Vasíli said, "You don't know what you are doing."
The princess shouted, "Vile woman!"
The princess darted unexpectedly at Anna Mikháylovna.
The princess snatched the portfolio from Anna Mikháylovna.
Prince Vasíli bent his head.
Prince Vasíli spread out his hands.
A terrible door that Pierre had watched for a long time and that had always opened quietly burst noisily open.
The door banged against the wall.
The second sister rushed out of the door wringing her hands.
The second sister cried, "What are you doing!"
The second sister said, "He is dying and you leave me alone with him!"
The second sister dropped the portfolio.
Anna Mikháylovna stooped and quickly caught the portfolio.
Anna Mikháylovna ran into the bedroom.
The eldest princess followed Anna Mikháylovna.
Prince Vasíli followed Anna Mikháylovna.
The eldest sister emerged with a pale hard face.
The eldest sister bit her underlip.
The eldest sister's expression showed irrepressible hatred when she saw Pierre.
The eldest sister said, "Yes, now you may be glad!"
The eldest sister said, "This is what you have been waiting for."
The eldest sister burst into tears.
The eldest sister hid her face in her handkerchief.
The eldest sister rushed from the room.
Prince Vasíli came to the room next.
Prince Vasíli staggered to the sofa where Pierre was sitting.
Prince Vasíli dropped onto the sofa.
Prince Vasíli covered his face with his hand.
Pierre noticed that Prince Vasíli was pale.
Pierre noticed that Prince Vasíli's jaw quivered and shook as if in an ague.
Prince Vasíli said, "Ah, my friend!"
Prince Vasíli took Pierre by the elbow.
Prince Vasíli's voice contained sincerity and weakness that Pierre had never observed before.
Prince Vasíli said, "How often we sin, how much we deceive, and all for what?"
Prince Vasíli said, "I am near sixty, dear friend."
Prince Vasíli said, "I too."
Prince Vasíli said, "All will end in death, all!"
Prince Vasíli said, "Death is awful."
Prince Vasíli burst into tears.
Anna Mikháylovna came out last.
Anna Mikháylovna approached Pierre with slow, quiet steps.
Anna Mikháylovna said, "Pierre!"
Pierre gave Anna Mikháylovna an inquiring look.
Anna Mikháylovna kissed Pierre on his forehead.
Anna Mikháylovna wet Pierre's forehead with her tears.
Anna Mikháylovna said, "He is no more."
Pierre looked at Anna Mikháylovna over his spectacles.
Anna Mikháylovna said, "Come, I will go with you."
Anna Mikháylovna said, "Try to weep, nothing gives such relief as tears."
Anna Mikháylovna led Pierre into the dark drawing room.
Pierre was glad that no one could see his face.
Anna Mikháylovna left Pierre.
Anna Mikháylovna returned and found Pierre fast asleep with his head on his arm.
Anna Mikháylovna said to Pierre in the morning: "Yes, my dear, this is a great loss for us all, not to speak of Pierre."
Anna Mikháylovna said: "But God will support Pierre."
Anna Mikháylovna said: "Pierre is young."
Anna Mikháylovna said: "Pierre is now, I hope, in command of an immense fortune."
Anna Mikháylovna said: "The will has not yet been opened."
Anna Mikháylovna believes that the will will not turn Pierre's head.
Anna Mikháylovna said to Pierre: "The will imposes duties on Pierre."
Anna Mikháylovna said to Pierre: "Pierre must be a man."
Pierre was silent.
Anna Mikháylovna said: "Perhaps later on I may tell Pierre, my dear boy, that if I had not been there, God only knows what would have happened!"
Anna Mikháylovna said: "Pierre knows that Uncle promised me only the day before yesterday not to forget Borís."
The Uncle had no time.
Anna Mikháylovna said: "I hope, my dear friend, Pierre will carry out your father's wish."
